The world of cats

by: Dendesam Wedi Dendas - June 15, 2017
  • First Visit to Be'ati Hagosa Posted: June 10, 2019
  • Bus Drive from Mekelle to Adigrat Posted: June 09, 2019
  • Flight from Addis Ababa to Mekelle Posted: June 08, 2019
  • EEC Alumni Day Posted: June 16, 2017
  • The world of cats Posted: June 15, 2017

Cats are wonderful creatures. They like to keep themselves mostly clean. They clean their mouthes after each meal. They also like to groom themleves. Having eaten and cleaned themselves up

they will spend most of the day time sleeping. Then, towards the evening, they like to get out and explore their surroundings, marking territory.
Cats and dogs are mostly enemies. But, if properly trained, they make good friends. It is the dog that learns quickly to tolerate the cat however. The cat will continue playing tricks on the poor dog.

Additional information, and maybe a Link or two
